Description:
Required skills to be successful3 years of product management experience
Must have Toyota or UAE experience in the automotive industry. Good understanding of distributor, dealer and or OEM works.
Strong business acumen with excellent analytical and financial skills with the ability to use data to build a compelling business case Team player
Team Player What equips you for the roleUniversity Degree (Automotive / Mechanical engineering preferred) 
Minimum 8 years of experience in automotive industry with at least 3 years in product related roles
OEM experience desirable
Ability to understand the technical aspects of the vehicle. 
Ability to study, analyze and interpret complex activities and/or information in order to improve new practices or develop new approaches. 
Strong decision-making skills with an eye for strategic enhancement of the business. 
Excellent communication and facilitation skills to understand and address issues across multiple disciplines. 
Advanced project management skills and ability to handle multiple tasks and manage deadlines. 
Passionate about automotive products 
Strong influencer
Excellent Interpersonal Skills, able to build strong relationships and trust
Natural seller of vision / ideas 
Willing to experiment and comfortable with ambiguity.  Job Details
